name: Beginners End
description: You and your little brother are alone after an apocalyptic event. Your only hope for survival is to loot old buildings for food and resources. Where you start is where you need to end. Enter locations and solve puzzles to survive. What the location has to loot is indicated on the wall where you start. The goal item is the most important with the collectables next to win a level, bonus stuff is … bonus. It’s almost Christmas and you must collect goal items to make it a little bit better for your little brother in this dead world.
